recipe_name: Fried halloumi with courgette and bean salad
author: Tony Tobin
method: Using a peeler, peel the courgette into thin 'ribbons' for the salad. Place into a bowl. Add the coriander, mixed beans, lemon juice and olive oil and toss well. Season to taste with salt and freshly ground black pepper. In a small frying pan with a little oil add the slices of halloumi and cook for 20 seconds on each side. Serve the courgette and bean salad on a plate and place the fried halloumi on top.
